# @web-std/form-data

![Node.js CI][node.js ci]
[![package][version.icon] ![downloads][downloads.icon]][package.url]
[![styled with prettier][prettier.icon]][prettier.url]

Web API compatible [FormData][] for nodejs.

## Install

```sh
npm install @web-std/form-data
```
